import AdminLayout from './AdminLayout'; import AdminStyleSheet from './adminStyleSheet'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSearch, faBars, faPersonBooth, faUsers, faListAlt, faWarehouse, faTags, faPercent, faChartBar } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faProductHunt } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { Nav, Form, FormControl, Button, Spinner, Tab, Row, Col, } from "react-bootstrap" import Vendors from './admin-dashboard/vendors'; import Customers from './admin-dashboard/customers'; import Products from './admin-dashboard/products'; import ProductCategories from './admin-dashboard/product-categories'; import Inventory from './admin-dashboard/inventory'; import Discounts from './admin-dashboard/discount'; import Commision from './admin-dashboard/commision'; import Reports from './admin-dashboard/reports'; const Dashboard = props => (
{/* Toogle Button Components */}
{/* End of the Toogle Button Components */} {/* Tabs Components */}
Vendors
Customers
Products
Categories
Inventory
Discounts

Reports
{/* End of the Tabs Components */}
) export default Dashboard;
